quote: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, learning from failure. – Colin Powell
fact: Emus and kangaroos cannot walk backwards, and are on the Australian coat of arms for that reason.
joke: Feeling pretty proud of myself. The Sesame Street puzzle I bought said 3-5 years, but I finished it in 18 months.
